tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: My experience with doc deepanju mam is from wen she was treating to my dad wen he was admitted frist time in fortis hospital dat time my dad said she is well experienced and friendly and her medesince also r too good for diabetic patient dey vill not at all harm to any body parts n she is very sweet n understanding I love her very much..

Fortis La Femme Bangalore, receptionist at the doctors room was impatient. 
Doctor  reached the hospital 50 minutes late after the appointment although she attended well. 
None of the medicines prescribed by her was available in the hospital pharmacy. 
Practo staff  couldn't connect with the hospital to help me know how long to wait.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: **** ****** ** * ********* ***** *** ***** ** ********* ******** *** **** ***** *** *********** ** *** *********** ***********  ******** *** ***** *** ******** *********** She told me to get admitted, I am suffering from rheumatoid arthritis, and was supposed to call a doctor for rheumatology, but the hospital I stayed has no doctor for rheumatology, she finally told me could not arrange anyone,,and treated for nothing,  although I paid for hospital, her fees for five visits *** * ** ***** ********* **** ********* **** searching for **** doctors in rheumatology.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
context: Thyroid Disorders,Dengue,Throat infection,Blood Pressure Changes,Respiratory tract infection,
review: Dr Deepanju is more like our family doctor. Many times over the last 10 years she has treated us and cured all of us from some ailment or the other. She has a very kind and pleasant personality. Sometimes her schedule is very busy with a huge number of outpatients in addition to in patients that require her urgently, hence the wait times are long. She prescribe only necessary tests for diagnosing the ailment and also makes recommendations if a specialist needs to be consulted. When my father was admitted in Zion due to a pulmonary issue along with very high BP and a stomach infection, Doctor Deepanju oversaw his treatment. My family and I are very grateful to her.

I've had a similar experience at Fortis la femme, but i decided to give this place a try for the second time. At the time of my appointment, the receptionist called the doctor who said she will be 10 mins late. HALF AN HOUR later, i asked the receptionist again and the doc mentioned that she will be 10 mins late. By this time i was losing my trust in this establishment *** ********** **** ****** **** ** ******** *** ******* ** ** **** ***** *** *** ************* another 10 mins later (by which the doc still hadn't arrived, surprise surprise) i finally demanded a refund which they took 10 mins to pay back. absolutely p-a-the-t-ic. Please don't visit Fortis la femma (unless you've had a good experience with a doc) and especially do not visit this doc if you value your time. *** *** **** ***** *** ******** ********* ***** ******** ***** *** **** ******

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Very humble doctor... I likw the way she explains the complications and the treatment for it in a simple manner..

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review: Nice & experienced. Problem solved.. On treatment. Medicine provided as per requirement. Strongly recommended.
